reviewText: Be Cool is my favorite out of the two.  I think the cast in both was just fun together.  I enjoyed both of them.

reviewText: Was looking for be cool, seen this movie a few years back and really liked it. Found this with both and couldn't resist. Love these double features. Always inexpensive and fast delivery

reviewText: Though most sequels are never as good as the original, and that's true here, Be Cool is a not-so-bad movie.  So if you are considering buying Get Shorty, a truly great comedy with great lines, then please spend the few extra dollars for both.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Imagine you could get two super movies for the price of one well here it is.Sony pictures has released Be Cool/Get Shorty,as a two pack.Wow..Now you can double the comedy,see extreme blackmail,pain and loads of fun.Mix in a really great cast,and you get an ultra recomended dvd disc set.Yes it is silly and not always believable,but remember we see a movie to be entertained.And oh yes you wont be disappointed...I give this set a 5+ rating!!!Enjoy!! I thank you Stewart L.
summary: If you like violence gambling,blackmail,extreme humor,you will love this two pack for 13.99.
